Happy!\nFleet!\nHalloween!\nハロウィンを楽しむ艦娘\: Happy! Fleet! Halloween! This is a special floorboard for shipgirls enjoying Halloween.
Trick or Treat!\nハロウィンを楽しむ艦娘\nたちのために用意され: Trick or Treat! This is a special admiral room wall prepared for the ship girls to enjoy Halloween. What exactly is the admiral's room...?
ねぇねぇ、清霜、強い？\n強くなった？ 武蔵さん\nの次…位に強くなったで\nし: Hey, hey, Kiyoshimo, are you strong? Have you gotten stronger? You've become second only to Musashi... as strong as ever, right? This is the personal belongings shelf of this smug destroyer.
鎮守府お芋備蓄の祭壇: Naval Base Sweet Potato Stockpile Altar
某白露型の一番艦が収穫\nの秋に備えて密かに準備\nしたお芋備蓄棚です。\n祭壇: This is a sweet potato storage shelf that was secretly prepared on board a certain Shiratsuyu-class ship in preparation for the autumn harvest. It is set up as an altar, and for some reason, her own autumn and winter clothes are also included...
秋のお芋を愛する駆逐艦\nがバルジも気にせずお芋\nを堪能する会です。提督\nも: This is a gathering for destroyers who love autumn sweet potatoes, where they can enjoy sweet potatoes without worrying about the bulges. The admiral has also been invited, and mysterious meetings unfold daily
艦隊十周年の秋刀魚祭り！\n第十駆逐隊の面々と歴史と\n経験を誇る艦娘による大漁: Fleet 10th Anniversary Pacific Saury Festival! This is a fishing flag celebrating the bountiful catch made by the members of the 10th Destroyer Squadron and their shipgirls who boast a long history and experience, and the success of the Naval Base Saury Festival!
クリスマスの季節の提督室\nを盛り上げるフロアマット\nを備えた床板セットです。: This floorboard set comes with a floor mat that will liven up the Admiral's room even more during the Christmas season. It is popular not only with coastal defense ships and destroyers but also with some battleships.
クリスマスの季節の提督室\nをさらに盛り上げるオーナ\nメントデザインの壁です。: This is a wall with an ornament design that will further enliven the admiral's room during the Christmas season. Pair this with seasonal flooring and you're all set for Christmas!
緑のツリーデザインと艦娘\nたちへの無数のプレゼント\n箱の赤色で構成された冬の: This is a winter wallpaper with a green tree design and countless red gift boxes for the ship girls. This season is a little exciting!
一見普通のクリスマス色の\nカーペットに見えて、旗艦\nによっては謎のペットたち: At first glance, it looks like an ordinary Christmas-colored carpet, but it is a rare mysterious carpet that is rumored to have mysterious pets roaming around in some flagships.
謹賀新年！第百一号掛け軸: Happy New Year! No. 101 Hanging Scroll
着岸擱座上陸を得意とした\n戦車も揚陸可能なある輸送\n艦がしたためた令和六年の: This is a New Year's hanging scroll celebrating the year 2024, painted by a transport ship capable of landing tanks and specializing in beached landings. Happy New Year and safe docking! Yeah!
主力オブ主力な艦隊型駆逐\n艦夕雲型のために家具職人\nが製作した特注の窓です。: This is a custom-made window made by a furniture maker for the Mainstay of Mainstay destroyers, the Yugumo-class. During the Setsubun season, some slightly dangerous things are enshrined.
第七駆逐隊メンバーの私物\nや装備の一部を置く特注の\n棚です。七駆のペットたち: This is a custom-made shelf to hold some of the personal belongings and equipment of the members of the 7th Destroyer Squadron. Do you like the Seven Drive pets? They change a little with each season...maybe!
桜並木の石畳: Cobblestone Pavement Lined with Cherry Blossom Trees
春、桜並木の道を艦娘たち\nと歩くのもいいですね……\n提督のそんな想いを強引に: It would be nice to walk along the cherry blossom-lined road with the ship girls in spring... The stone floor allows the Admiral to forcibly bring such feelings into his office at the Naval Base.
海が見える桜の壁紙: Cherry Blossom Wallpaper with Ocean View
よく晴れた日に桜咲く静か\nな場所で海を見ていたい…\n日々の激務に追われている: I want to look at the ocean in a quiet place with cherry blossoms blooming on a sunny day... This wallpaper of cherry blossoms and the sea brings to life the vision of the Admiral, busy with his daily grind.
春は新しいことを始めたく\nなる季節！そんな弾む心を\n秘めた読書好きの艦娘たち: Spring is the season that makes you want to start something new! This spring reading window was made by a master furniture maker as a gift for those joyful, book-loving ship girls.
艦隊はまさかの十一周年！\n艦隊十一周年を記念して、\n第十一駆逐隊のメンバーが: Fleet's 11th anniversary! To commemorate the fleet's 11th anniversary, the members of the 11th Destroyer Squadron prepared this old and new commemorative scroll!
鎮守府の家具職人たちが腕\nによりをかけて制作した特\n注の五月飾りです。小さな: These are custom-made May decorations, carefully crafted by the furniture craftsmen of the naval base. It is filled with prayers that the little ship girls will grow up strong and big.
菖蒲と柏餅の提督秘書机: Secretary and Admiral's Desk with Irises and Kashiwamochi
菖蒲の季節を愉しむ提督と\n秘書艦娘の執務机です。\n美味しい柏餅で仕事の合間\: This is the desk of the admiral and his secretary ship girl as they enjoy the iris season. Enjoy a delicious break from work with some kashiwamochi and ship girls. Dynamic discount available!
家具職人らが五月雨の名を\n持つ駆逐艦をイメージして\n作り上げた水色の床です。: The light blue floor was created by furniture makers in the image of a destroyer named Samidare. You can also get a custom-made rug with her image on it!
八戸の盾と云われた雲霞の\nような敵機から街と人々を\n守った小さな戦士の私物棚: This is the personal belongings shelf of a little warrior who was called Hachinohe's Shield and protected the city and its people from the clouds of enemy planes. With the further refurbished ships being assigned, there are some slight changes!
紫陽花の美しさを楽しむ和\n箪笥です。この季節、艦娘\n人気の花ですが…実はこの: This is a Japanese chest of drawers that allows you to enjoy the beauty of hydrangeas. This flower is popular with ship girls this season, but... it's actually poisonous... Ah, you know that, as expected!
提督と任務娘…じゃない…\n第一艦隊旗艦としても優秀\nなある軽巡の執務机です。: This is the desk of an admiral and his quest girl...no...it is the desk of a certain light cruiser who is also an excellent flagship of the First Fleet. Apparently the snacks served with tea change with the seasons...
木漏れ日のすだれ: Blinds with Sunlight Filtering Through the Foliage
梅雨が明けると少しずつ夏\nの気配が感じられるように\nなります。夏の木漏れ日を: As the rainy season ends, you can gradually feel the signs of summer. Enjoy the summer sun filtering through the leaves, and enjoy the perfect blinds for this season!
味方を護る…そんな武人の\nような心を持つ防空駆逐艦\nのあまり私物のない私物棚: Protecting allies... This is the personal belongings shelf of an anti-aircraft destroyer with a warrior-like heart, and contains very few personal possessions. Even after the renovation...it doesn't look like there will be a significant increase in personal belongings.
秋月型防空駆逐艦「初月」\nの精密模型を飾った、家具\n職人がその魂を込めて作り: This paulownia chest of drawers, decorated with a detailed model of the Akizuki-class anti-aircraft destroyer "Hatsuzuki," was created by a furniture craftsman who poured his soul into it. On Kai Ni nights, it goes in rear guard mode!
梅雨明けを待っていた駆逐\n艦姉妹とその長女による、\n提督と彼女の執務机です。: This is an admiral office desk made by the destroyer sisters eldest girls, who were waiting for the end of the rainy season. Seasonal drinks and recommended snacks may or may not be available!
鎮守府神社境内の石畳: Naval Base Shrine's Precincts' Stone Pavement
鎮守府秋祭りが開催される\n鎮守府神社、その境内の石\n畳です。気軽な気持ちで、: This is the cobblestone path within the grounds of Naval Base Shrine, where the Naval Base Autumn Festival is held. Just casually going behind the shrine with the ship girls...is forbidden.
艦娘総出で準備する鎮守府\n秋祭りの季節、焼きそばの\n香ばしいソースの匂い漂う: The entire fleet is preparing for the autumn festival at the naval base. The smell of savory yakisoba sauce wafts through the air, and there are festival stalls and lanterns... Eh? What? Is this... the Admiral's room?
鎮守府提督室に分祀された\n艦娘の艦内神社です。\n艦娘の安全やその無事の帰\n: This is a shipboard shrine for ship girls, enshrined separately in the Naval Base Admiral's Room. They will be placed in order to pray for the safety of the ship girls, their safe return, and the success of the mission.
第三戦隊を構成する金剛型\n高速戦艦各艦娘と提督との\n二人だけのオフの時間を愉: This is a table for enjoying some off-time for the Admiral and the Kongou-class fast battleships that make up the Third Squadron! ※Changes depending on the season.
秋南瓜祭りの季節。仮装の\n準備に余念のない艦娘達の\nために、職人が特注で用意: Autumn is the season for the pumpkin festival. These Halloween decorations were custom-made by a craftsman for the ship girls who are busy preparing their costumes! ※Dynamic discount available!
十二年目の海、その秋刀魚\n漁は最上型の出番ですわ！\n最上型重巡四姉妹が大漁と: It's the twelfth year at sea, and saury fishing, the Mogami-class comes into play! The four sisters of the Mogami-class heavy cruisers are praying for a good catch, bountiful harvest, and the safety of the fleet, with the Kumarinko fishing flag!
年末年始を落ち着いて艦娘\nたちと迎える。そんな提督\nにぴったりな年越しの壁。: Welcome the New Year's holidays in peace with your shipgirls. This New Year's Eve wall is perfect for such an admiral. Also perfectly fits with the New Year's Eve Floor and Small Hearth. Have a peaceful day.
年越しの床と小型囲炉裏: New Year's Eve Floor and Small Hearth
寒い冬を越えて新しき年に\n向かって艦娘たちと静かに\n過ごす時間。それはそれで: A quiet time spent with the shipgirls as we get through the cold winter and look forward to the new year. That is a good thing in its own way. This is the New Year's Eve floor with a small hearth built in.
津軽海峡ではないけれど冬\n景色の海も良きものです。\n壁一面に描かれた雪景色の: Although it's not the Tsugaru Strait, the winter scenery of the sea is also beautiful. A snow-covered sea and harbor landscape is painted across the entire wall. So, what kind of room will you make, Admiral?
雪景色かまくらと鳥居の壁: Snowy Landscape with Snow Igloos and Torii Gate
山々の自然、深々と降る雪\nと神社へ繋がる路の鳥居。\nそこに作られたかまくら。: The natural beauty of the mountains, heavy snowfall, and the torii gate leading to the shrine. Snow igloos were built there. The winter scenery of my once Japanese hometown is now at the military base.
恭賀新年!平安掛け軸: Happy New Year! Heian Hanging Scroll
刻をこえて……令和七年の\n現代も横浜港で静かに海を\n見守り続ける姉を持つ、潜: Beyond time... In the present year of Reiwa 7th, a submarine tender prays for peace for its sister who continues to quietly watch over the seas at Yokohama Port. This is a hanging scroll to welcome the New Year.
改特I型駆逐艦の制服掛け: Kai Special Type I Destroyer Uniform Hanger
吹雪型駆逐艦「吹雪・白雪\n・初雪・深雪」の艦娘制服\nを掛けておく専用ハンガー: This is a special hanger for hanging the uniforms of the Fubuki-class destroyers "Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Miyuki". You can feel... a little bit of each personality.
吹雪型二番艦の駆逐艦娘が\n提督のために作ってくれた\n愛情たっぷり手作りカレー: This is a homemade curry made with love by the second Fubuki-class destroyer for the Admiral. It's delicious and hearty, and will give you energy for tomorrow!
鎮守府中に甘い香りが漂う\n季節にぴったりのスイーツ\n柄のガーリーな壁紙です。: This girly wallpaper features a sweets pattern, perfect for the season when sweet scents fill the air throughout the naval base. Pair it with a chocolate bar-shaped desk!
トリコロールの国から来た\n大型駆逐艦のために提督が\n職人の力を借りて作った窓: This window was made by the Admiral with the help of craftsmen for a large destroyer from the tricolor country. Maybe the outfit will change... a little with the season?
某艦娘の私物棚です。\n改二改装後の彼女を秘書艦\nにすると……やや警戒感の\n: This is a shelf for a certain shipgirl's personal belongings. If you make her your secretary after the Kai Ni remodel...she's a little wary, but maybe there will be a slight change.
十二周年の春に用意された\n優しいオレンジ色が温かい\n春の壁紙です。春のオレン: This warm spring wallpaper features a gentle orange color, prepared for the 12th spring anniversary. It goes perfectly with the orange spring curtained windows and the ship girls in dresses.
大きなリボン状のタッセル\nがキュートなオレンジ色の\n春カーテン。そして、白い: Cute orange spring curtains with large ribbon-shaped tassels. The white wooden window frames and flowers create an elegant space and atmosphere.
艦隊の十二周年を記念して\n艦娘たちが準備してくれた\nお祝いのメモリアルブーケ: This is a commemorative bouquet prepared by the ship girls to commemorate the fleet's 12th anniversary. Dress up the admiral's office in orange.
提督室専用オレンジライト\nと艦娘への贈り物を置いて\nおくための、小さなサイド: A small side table for keeping the orange light for the Admiral's room and gifts for the ship girls. If you look closely, there is a small box along with the bouquet...
提督と艦娘たちの、楽しい\n午後のティーパーティ。\nそのために準備された白と\: A fun afternoon tea party for the Admiral and his ship girls. The furniture prepared for this occasion is a set of luxury white and orange chairs and a tea ceremony table.
十二周年を迎えた艦隊！\n第二航空戦隊のオレンジ色\nの精鋭航空母艦娘。彼女が\: The fleet celebrates its 12th anniversary! The elite orange-hued aircraft carrier girl of the Second Carrier Division. This is a commemorative scroll that she created together with her fellow ships and admirals.
船乗りの相棒、猫。そんな\n猫とその足跡をモチーフに\n作られた猫の足跡壁です。: A sailor's companion, a cat. This cat paw wall was created based on the motif of cats and their paw prints. This adorable wall is popular with cat-loving admirals and shipgirls.
いつの間にか鎮守府に住み\nついて、すっかり提督にも\n懐いた猫。艦娘たちも可愛: Before anyone knew it, the cat had taken up residence at the naval base and had become completely attached to the admiral. This is the home of a cat that the shipgirls adore. ※Dynamic discount available with craftsmen.
匠の職人の技によって完成\nした鎮守府に再現した南方\nの砂浜。水も綺麗で特型駆: A southern sandy beach has been recreated at the naval base, completed by the skilled craftsmanship of master artisans. The water is also clean, making it popular with Special Type destroyers as well as other destroyers and coastal defense ships!
青空と山側の夏雲: Blue Sky and Summer Clouds on the Mountain Side
手前が海なので背景となる\n夏山が欲しい…という提督\nにお贈りする夏の太陽と雲: The sea is in the foreground, so we want a summer mountain in the background... For those admirals who want a dazzling blue sky with summer sun and clouds! Be careful... of the birds overhead!
梅雨明けの木製壁: Wooden Wall After the Rainy Season
梅雨明けの季節、夏本番の\n到来を待つ艦娘たち！\nそんな季節の鎮守府にぴっ\n: As the rainy season comes to an end, the shipgirls await the arrival of summer! This wooden wall is perfect for the naval base during this season. I can't wait for summer to come!
夏の砂浜への出撃準備棚: Preparation Shelf for Summer Beach Trips
梅雨が明ければ艦娘たちは\n夏の眩しい砂浜へと出撃準\n備を始めていきます！そん: Once the rainy season is over, the shipgirls will begin preparations to head out to the dazzling summer sandy beaches! This is the shelf of summer personal belongings that they placed in the Admiral's room for some reason.
ソロモンの海にも暑い熱い\n夏がやってきます！\n夏の夜の海に繰り出すある\n防: The hot summer is coming to Solomon's Sea! This is the summer personal belongings shelf of an anti-aircraft cruiser and her friendly destroyers, setting out on the seas on a summer night.
